Thaddeus.description: Whenever the target of your Shield of Faith is hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 5 spell rad dmg from you
The bonus AC for upcasting your Shield of Faith is increased by 2. Additionally, it needs 2 fewer slot levels per upcast bonus.
Your Shield of Faith no longer requires concentration.
Thaddeus.upgrade: +1 duration step for Shield of Faith/1
